learningContent: **World War II** (1939â€“1945) was a global conflict involving many nations. Key events include the invasion of Poland, the Battle of Britain, D-Day, and the atomic bombings of Hiroshima and Nagasaki.

questions.questionText: In which year did World War II begin?
What was the codename for the Allied invasion of Normandy?
In what year did World War II end?
